Subject; Procedure for screening of passengers, persons other than passengers
and their belongings.

In exercise of powers conferred under rules 31, 32 and 62 (1) of the Aircraft

(Security) Rules, 2023, the Director General, Bureau of Civil/Aviation Security, for
the purpose of the safety of passengers, crew, ground personnel and the general
publiciin all matters relating 'to, safeguarding against actjof unlawful interference
with civil aviation, direct for paftial modification to AvSee Circular No. 23/2005
dated 11.7.2005.

‘The contents of Para 2.3 is hereby deleted and new contents is hereby inserted

in-situ:

“ 2.3 Passengers and persons other than passengers including cabin baggage,
belorigings and airport supply/merchandise shall be screened through Primary
ard secondary screening methods as mentioned below:

@) Primary'screening:

i) Passengers and, persons other than passengers: Door Frame Metal
Detector (DFMD)

ii) Cabin baggage, belongings and airport supply/merchandise: X-ray
screening (X-BIS), manual search in case where X-BIS is not
avaitabie/not functional.

b) Secondary screening:
i) Passengers and persons other than passengers: Hand Held Metal
Detector (HHMD), Pat-Down Search, Explosive Detection System (EDS).

ii) Cabin baggage, belongings and airport supply/merchandise: Manual
Search, Explosive Detection System (EDS) and/or Explosive Detection

Dog (EDD)
